t: Joy Is Made As Amazon Releases New Holiday Ad Campaign
s: November 15, 2022 - Amazon just released its holiday ad campaign, Joy is Made. The ad tells the story of a father who recognizes the special attachment that his daughter has to a snow globe. He builds a life-style replica of the child's snow globe in the backyard making her holiday magical.
